DOC.brief_summary: Non-interventional extension study investigate VVC recurrence candida colonization follow P2 acute VVC study
DOC.brief_title: Non-Interventional Extension Investigate Recurrence Vulvovaginal Candidiasis Candida Colonization
DOC.detailed_description: Following completion Phase 2 , multicenter , randomize , active-controlled study safety tolerability two formulation CD101 compare fluconazole treatment moderate severe episode acute vulvovaginal candidiasis ( NCT07299432 ) , subject without recurrence VVC follow additional 90 day +/- 14 day assess candida colonization recurrence VVC .
DOC.criteria: Enrollment complete primary study Day 28 visit . Received least one dose study drug primary study Able give write informed consent prior completion primary study Received systemic topical vaginal nonstudy antifungal therapy time primary study Diagnosed bacterial vaginosis , trichomonas , gonorrhea , chlamydia , active herpes point primary study The Principal Investigator considers subject participate study
